mapper.update: update user_info set user_uuid = #{userUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, real_name = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_password = #{userPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_roles = #{userRoles,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_valid = #{isValid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modified_time = #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, user_uuid, user_name, real_name, user_password, user_roles, is_valid, created_time, modified_time from user_info where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
